sn35.142:1.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppadaya, sopi anatta.
sn35.142:1.3: Anattasambhutam, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto atta bhavissati …pe…
sn35.142:1.5: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo jivhaya uppadaya, sopi anatta.
sn35.142:1.6: Anattasambhuta, bhikkhave, jivha kuto atta bhavissati …pe…
sn35.142:1.8: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppadaya, sopi anatta.
sn35.142:1.9: Anattasambhuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto atta bhavissati.
